data.title: Pianist): Singer and pianist
data.meta_description: A professional singer and pianist specialising in soul, jazz, R&B, and folk music!
data.text:
Sara is a professional singer and pianist based in Manchester, specialising in soul, jazz, R&B and folk music. She has a huge amount of experience performing at weddings, events and hotels/restaurants across the UK. In Manchester, she is a regular musician at venues including The Fitzgerald, Albert's Restaurants, Matt & Phred’s, Mala Secret Garden, and Zaranda Didsbury.

Sara trained as a classical pianist and singer in her teenage years and holds an ABRSM Grade 8 Distinction in both piano and singing. She went on to study Music at King's College London where she graduated with a First Class BMus degree. After graduating, Sara transferred her skills to popular music performance and has worked closely with soul, pop and R&B musicians across London, Manchester and Liverpool for over 10 years.

Sara recently began her own business which offers her smooth vocals not only as a solo performer, but also in the form of an acoustic duo, a jazz band, and a vocal harmony collective. Sara founded her company in 2019 and they are currently working on a show that celebrates the life and music of Eva Cassidy.

What's your previous experience and how did you start gigging?

I trained as a classical pianist and singer in my teenage years, and hold an ABRSM Grade 8 Distinction in both piano and singing. I went on to study Music at King's College London where I graduated with a First Class BMus degree. After graduating, I transferred my skills to popular music performance, and have worked closely with soul, pop and R&B musicians across London, Manchester and Liverpool for over 10 years.

I now perform at weddings, events and hotels/restaurants across the UK. In Manchester, I am a regular musician at venues including The Fitzgerald, Albert's Restaurants, Matt & Phred’s, Mala Secret Garden, and Zaranda Didsbury.
